ModMetaData.name: [FIXED]Embasy
ModMetaData.author: Community fork of AliceCecil
ModMetaData.description:
Embassy, sic. - zone an area to have your allies setup an embassy in the zone. Warning they will own whatever you placed in the zone. Photo of The U.S. Embassy in Ljubljana, in the Republic of Slovenia.
Effectively a trader builds a base on your map and lives there, adds a world tic that makes the traders needs solid.
Ambassador (vacant), with Gautam Rana is the Chargé d’Affaires ad interim at the Embassy of the United States in Slovenia. I think he's attractive, as is the building so that's why I picked this one.
